import React from 'react' import logo from '../../img/puma-logo.svg'; import bg1 from '../../img/img-1.jpg'; import bg2 from '../../img/img-2.jpg'; import bg3 from '../../img/img-3.jpg'; import bg4 from '../../img/img-4.jpg'; import bg5 from '../../img/img-5.jpg'; import Menu from './../Menu/Menu'; // import Card from './../Card/Card'; import personFirst from '../../img/person-1.jpg'; import personSecond from '../../img/person-2.jpg'; import personThird from '../../img/person-3.jpg'; import personFourth from '../../img/person-4.jpg'; import personFiveth from '../../img/person-5.jpg'; import './App.sass'; const menu = [ { text: 'Studio' }, { text: 'Partners' }, { text: 'Media' }, { text: 'user' } ] const card = { img: [personFirst, personSecond, personThird, personFourth, personFiveth], alt: "profileImg", profileName: ["Carl Yohan", "May Clarcson", "Zac Manson", "Nelson Onil", "Adam Burns"] } const App = () => { const [point, setPoint] = React.useState({ strokeDashoffset: 1004, background: bg1 }); // let goStep = (strokeLength, srcBg) => { // setPoint({ // strokeDashoffset: strokeLength, // background: srcBg // }) // } return (
setPoint({strokeDashoffset: 1004, background: bg1})}> setPoint({strokeDashoffset: 753, background: bg2})}> setPoint({strokeDashoffset: 502, background: bg3})}> setPoint({strokeDashoffset: 251, background: bg4})}> setPoint({strokeDashoffset: 0, background: bg5})}>
{/* */}
) } export default App;
